metadata.title: Best Tasting Green Tomatoes Sambar | With Homemade Sambar Masala |South Indian Vegetarian Recipe
metadata.description:
Green tomatoes, lentil, eggplant and roasted ground coconut masala cooked together to make this finger licking sambar.
ðŸ‘‰Recipe: https://bit.ly/3g4VZbg
Connect with me via:
Fb: https://www.facebook.com/CookingwithThas/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thasneen
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/thasneen/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cookingwiththas/

transcription: [00:00.000] Wash and chop the green tomatoes, eggplant, and lentils.
[00:10.000] Dry roast coconut, red chili, and coriander seeds. Grind into a fine masala.
[00:25.000] Heat oil in a pan and add the chopped vegetables.
[00:35.000] Add water and cook until vegetables are soft.
[00:50.000] Mix in the ground masala and cook for 5 minutes.
[01:10.000] Add tamarind extract and salt. Bring to a boil.
[01:25.000] Simmer the sambar until thick and flavorful.
[01:45.000] Serve hot with rice or idli for a delicious South Indian meal.
